summary:
CDM BlackTrader Vani as Master esm file
with addin (plugin esp)
master file only requires skyrim
addin need correspodning dlcs to work.
descriptionHtml:
this files use standard skins so you can use any texture packs you like with it.
this is CDMBlackTrader  Vani
same spec as in steam workshop main diff its a master file meaning you can make plugins for it
HERE main spec for master file:


Images on this site taken with few mots like:
Better females by bella,
Apachiiskyhair
Calientes female body mod,
Better males favored souls,
BPP pack for female body,
CHSBHC_BPP armours 
daedric famle  mesh for CHSBHC BPP Laxi
self adjusted size of body via body slider tool.


using hires Bethesda pack and fixed my files for speed high res load.
adding in my Skyrim config files that you just need over write allows you that way to use 0-5000 mods if you feel like it and standard play is smoother too
with it you can use 2000*2000 textures or 4000*4000 textures with only a few lags  every 2-8 hours game play happening if playing nonstop..
and if you set your virtual memory to fix min  and max to 2 times you real ram your PC will run a lot smoother.

few factors on what the lags in Skyrim depend on:
1 your RAM
2 your graphic RAM
3 your virtual memory (your hard-drive space is used a ram)
4 your Hard-drive speed and its connection communication speed.
5 the declared usage of memory to the Skyrim game for graphic  under primary and secondary in skyrimpref.ini
by configuring them so its optimal for your system you can play a lot with many mods with  rarely lagging.

inside skyrimpref.ini you can set the primary and secondary texture size lower like 1024 times 2 or times 3. PS need min 4 gb ram set it my self primary to 6gb and secondary to 4gb ram precache.

OS windows 7 ultimate 64 bit.
running it on  amd tripple core phenomn 2.3 GHZ
with 4gb ram a
amd hd 6700 radeon graphic card with 1gb graphic ram
and normal SATA 2  hardrive.
i load round 20 mods and game play 90% smooth all i adjusted is just the skyrim configs from my skyrimconfig.rar
ps use winrar to unpack it.
if you have SSD disk it will run even smoother.

---------------------------------------------------
Requires skyrim only
advise load this mod befor unoffical skyrim patch so it load the quest fixes for main skyrim. for smooth quest play.
Adjusted all my created stuff to use Namespace CDMBTV for this mod for compatibility with more mods and DLCs
adds Vani to Whiterun
its compatible to with the 1.9.x
compatible with SKSE,SKYUI and mostly all mods out there.

-------ATTENTION money bug--------------------------------
A store manager is allowed to own 50k coins. but it will start bug at 31000 coins if a seller has more coins then 31 000 you will not get coins for sold items, the reason for that is how the main trade system is written and handled in skyrim. only way to fix them is wait 2 days beside them or anywhere so that the chest and coins get reset.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------


store open for following npcs:
Vani from 2am to 11 pm
Vrin and Lani open from 4 am to 11 pm.

all npcs now use Bannered Mare as home.


Added Vampire Ruingir in whiterun:
she is level 1-900
wears deadric enchanted gear 
uses deadric blade.
lover , follower ,marriage
works properly.


Added Vampire Rainna in whiterun:
she is level 1-900
wears deadric enchanted gear 
uses deadric blade.
lover , follower ,marriage
works properly.

Added Vampire Rion in whiterun:
she is level 1-900
wears mage enchanted gear 
uses spells for attack.
lover , follower ,marriage
works properly.
--------------------------------

Vani has main store.

Lani and Vrin have 30000 coins and without merchant perk only buy Vani gold coins.


Added Special Hired Town guards Called Black Guard 
atm active in Whiterun (Headquaters),Solitude,Windhelm,Riften,Markath 2 guards in each.
what help protect the towns people ps they count as essential so they never die.
if you get jail you get ported to whitrun jail since Main headquarter is in Whitrun.
you can get the items from white run jail area.
These guards will only help do dmg there is still a chance that normal people can die but they help decently enough so they town guys survive slight easier


In bit more details here:
He is behind the Tavern in whiterun.

to reset his coins and materials wait 48 hours and he is reset.

He has the following items:
200 iron ore 200 cordenium ore 200 ebony ore

10Black soulgem
10Filled Grand Soul gems.
10 Dearea heart
10 void salts
10 fire salts
10 forst salts
10 sabre cat tooth
10 snowberrys
20 Bear pelts
20 spriggan sap

added special gold coins:
1 000 gold coins
Black Banker Vrin close to Vani converts it back for buy the gold back.
 without the perk she only buys vani special 1000gold  once unlock merchant perk you can sell her anything.

has 2 use able disenchant:
Necklace of Minor Alchemy
Ring of Minor Smithing

he has standard shop 
coins always 23000. 
Removed store chest from map to prevent fast cheap money making.

special rings and Necklaces:

Ring of Trade Crafter Knowledge
increases only Blacksmith ,Alchemy, Enchanting and speech craft faster by 6000%.


Ring of Restricted Knowledge
Slows your learning speed  to 0.001%
none place able
its power is same uses perk system like Unbound knowledge.


Amulet of Unbound Knowledge (fast  skill gain)
Can use both at same time enchantment can be learn but not placed. When and if you use them is up to you, any time you want and nice skill learning boost. Unbound knowledge gives a 6000% skill training boost. 

NecklaceTrader gives 100% better prices can be learned but not placed.

Crafter ring removed to powerful.
 Spell power ring removed to powerful.
----------------------------------------------------------------
end of master file spec


master file can be used to replace esp version from steam workshop same thing only that it can be updated with one esp plugin.
the addin DG HF DB gives items from all DLC to vanis store  ps needs all 3 dlcs
the 3dlc download is the addin DG_HF_DB version
requirments:
you need all 3 dlc dawnguard ,hearthfirtes and dragonborn. this plugin adds items from all 3 dlcs.

the addin adds following to Vanis store:

200 bolts,
standard steel crossbow
20 heart stones,
20 stahlrim ore
100glass,
100 goat horns,
100straw
100 random children cloths
stahlrim pickaxe
noordic dagger with chaos enchant
standard nordic armour set,

this addin only changes the vani store items.

might Later version add addisn for each dlc alone and combo packs 2 dlc.
you only will need 1 addin esp file loaded otherwise they will override each other.

i hope this gives good details  and you can enjoy thisa small mod and its addin you welcome to make your own addin for it .
just use you initials  first as front namespace then add BTV on it then the name of it if you anna add new stuff to the addin ps thats for new items for pre made stuff i made just change it  and save it in the plugin file..
for your own personal use you welcome to do in the addin plugin any changes you like
. or make your own addin.


need only 1 plugin  since if you wanna add different things to the store its under world object containers then CDMBTVBlackTraderBOX in it the items vani sells are listed

if you want to share your addin its ok as long you mention this site here on nexus as resource.
author: Christian Madjari
